alert.note: Alert for Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 08 at 1:58PM CST until November 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Traverse County. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility on Thursday. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
